personal.name: Douglas Mo
personal.title: Business Analyst | AI Product Manager | Accounting Executive
personal.summary: Analytically-driven professional transitioning from financial accounting to AI/data systems development. Master's student in Business Analytics with hands-on experience building production RAG systems, digital twins, and full-stack AI applications. Combines 2+ years of international accounting experience with cutting-edge AI development skills including vector databases, LLM integration, and cloud deployment.
personal.elevator_pitch: I'm Douglas Mo, bridging business operations and AI technology. With 2+ years international accounting experience (managing $12M annual revenue) and intensive AI development training, I build production-grade intelligent systems that solve real business problems. My unique cross-functional background—from reducing distributor churn 27% at BF Suma to deploying 95% accuracy RAG systems—helps me understand both technical implementation and measurable business impact. I turn data into decisions and AI into ROI.

behavioral.question: Tell me about a time you had to learn a completely new technology quickly

star_answer.situation: Transitioned from pure accounting background to AI development with no prior programming experience
star_answer.task: Master full-stack AI development including TypeScript, RAG systems, and cloud deployment within 10-week bootcamp
star_answer.action: Structured learning plan: 4 hours daily coding practice, built 5+ projects progressively increasing in complexity
star_answer.result: Successfully deployed production-grade digital twin platform, now proficient in TypeScript/Python

technical.question: Walk me through how you would design a RAG system
technical.answer: Start with data ingestion, chunking with 500-1000 tokens, generate embeddings, store in vector database like Upstash, implement semantic search with hybrid scoring, use LLM for generation with retrieved context in prompt.

unique_value_propositions: Cross-functional expertise: Rare combination of financial accounting rigor with modern AI/data development skills
International experience: Worked in multiple countries (China, USA, Kenya, Australia)
Rapid learning ability: Demonstrated through successful career transition
Business-focused technologist: Don't just build for technology's sake - ensure focus on ROI and business outcomes
Production experience: Already have deployed systems with real users and CI/CD pipelines
Analytical rigor: Accounting precision combined with data science methodologies
